programme.title: MST3K: The Hellcats
programme.desc: Joel and the 'bots attempt to puzzle out what's going on in the unintelligible biker film, The Hellcats (1968)

programme.title: MST3K: The Horror Of Party Beach
programme.desc: Mike and the 'bots watch The Horror of Party Beach (1964).

programme.title: MST3K: Tormented
programme.desc: A jazz pianist is haunted by his dead ex-lover's crawling hand and floating head.

programme.title: Rifftrax: Hilbillys In A Haunted House
programme.desc: RiffTrax bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 60's non-scary horror classic!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on Top 20: From thrill-seekers who push their luck to pros who push the envelope. We're counting down the wildest ESCAPES FROM DEATH! Which will top the list? The three thousand foot skydive with no chute! How about the boy who takes a misguided ride on an escalator? Or the animal lover who toys with a grizzly! From thousands of videos all over the world these are the most jaw-dropping moments of life on the edge! Which will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – ESCAPES FROM DEATH!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! From hotheaded hillbillies to rowdy rednecks! We're counting down the wildest BACKWOODS BONEHEADS! Which of these yahoos will "get 'er done" to be NUMBER ONE? How about this country fire starter? Or the rebel who turns a car wash into a Dixieland shower? From thousands of videos all over the world these are the most jaw-dropping moments of bedlam in the boonies! Which will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – BACKWOODS BONEHEADS!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! These girls are feisty! And they like to play rough! We're counting down the baddest BATTLIN' BABES! Who will walk away with NUMBER ONE? The blonde bomber who takes on riot police? How about the talk show hookers who come out swinging? Or the grizzled granny who takes a stand against speeders! From thousands of videos all over the world these are the sexiest moments of female fury! Which will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – BATTLIN' BABES!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Who's got what it takes to be NUMBER ONE? The world's worst navigator? A human torpedo on a jet ski! Or a pair of jackasses looking for their big break? From highways and by-ways all over the world these are the most insane moments of motorized mayhem! Who will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – WHACKOS AT THE WHEEL!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! If dumb is fun these guys are having the best time ever! We're counting down the most outrageous – DUMB DUDES! Who poses the greatest threat to intelligence: This whiz kid? The redneck crock jock? Or the harebrain who won't go to a barber? From thousands of imbeciles all over the world we've selected only the finest! Who could be the dumbest of them all? Find out next! On TOP 20 – DUMB DUDES!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! The sun is shining and these outdoor idiots are cooked! We're counting down the most mind-boggling morons and their SUMMER BLOWOUTS! Who's got what it takes to be NUMBER ONE? The dried-up daredevils? The nutty physics professor? Or the blob bombshell! We've combed the beaches and raided backyards to track down the biggest sunshine saps! Find out who is NUMBER ONE! On TOP 20 – SUMMER SUMMER BLOWOUTS!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20 Some may scare you. Others make you laugh. We're counting down the best of the worst PRACTICAL JOKERS GONE WILD! Who will be NUMBER ONE? These master blasters? The groom who gets a lot more than a garter? How about the lightheaded pilot? Or the bachelor pad turned garden apartment?! From cranks and schemers all over the world we've picked only the most outrageous! Who will be NUMBER ONE?! Find out next on TOP 20 – PRACTICAL JOKERS GONE WILD!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! They're hungry for excitement and pigging-out on pain! We're counting down the largest, most titanic BIGGEST LOSERS! Who's got the guts to be NUMBER ONE? The super-sized skater on a roll? The chub-tastic train that gets derailed? Or what about this fast-food fanatic? We're scanning seismographs all over the world to bring you the most jaw-dropping moments of heavy-duty hijinks. Who's squeezing in at NUMBER ONE? Find out next! On TOP 20 BIGGEST LOSERS!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! They're under the influence and out of control! We're counting down the wildest BOOZERS AND LOSERS! Who will hit bottom at NUMBER ONE? The wino who's out on a limb and down on his luck? How about the tighty whitey wastoid who be trippin'? Or the hooch-hound who can't get over the hump? And don't forget about the sloshed ape who rips one! From thousands of videos all over the world these are the most jaw dropping moments of impaired insanity. Which will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 - BOOZERS AND LOSERS!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20! Some days are bad others are straight-up terrifying but we're counting down the very WORST DAYS ON THE JOB! Who will claim top honors? The reporter who scores an explosive scoop? Or the crane operator who drops the ball? How about the carnie who gets clocked? Or the worker trapped in the lion's denat lunchtime? We've searched the world for career disasters to bring you the most jaw-dropping moments of 9-to-5 nightmares! Who will be NUMBER ONE? On TOP 20 – WORST DAYS ON THE JOB!

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: "Tonight on TOP 20! Tempers are flaring and blood is boiling! We're counting down the hottest HOTHEADS FROM HELL! Who will top the list? The cook who flips his lid? Or the racing fan who blows a gasket? Don't count out the wrestler who's feeling touchy! From thousands of short fuses these are the most jaw-dropping moments of anger unleashed! Which will be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – HOTHEADS FROM HELL!"

programme.title: Top 20
programme.desc: Tonight on TOP 20 MOST SHOCKING! From boozing babes to hotheads in heels! We're counting down the wildest WOMEN OUT OF CONTROL! Which of these lovely ladies will claim top prize? The wannabe skater girl? Or the porn stars who don't get along? Don't count out this overly sensitive siren! From thousands of fired-up females we've selected only the "finest" moments of un-lady like behavior! Who's got the goods to be NUMBER ONE? Find out next on TOP 20 – WOMEN OUT OF CONTROL!
